subanswer.text: Yes. We have $r = \dfrac{a_{2k}}{a_{2k-1}}$. The answer is $\dfrac{a_{2k}}{a_{2k-1}}$.

Given that $a_{13}=2016$, we know that $a_{15}=r^2\cdot 2016$.
